Class CompanyRepresentativeController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseUserController
controller.CompanyRepresentativeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserController
public class CompanyRepresentativeController extends BaseUserController
Controller for company representative-specific operations. Handles internship creation, editing, deletion, visibility toggling, and application management (view, approve, reject, confirm placement).
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Method Details

    • listMyInternships

      public List<String> listMyInternships()
      Lists internships created by this rep (with status/visibility).
      Returns:
      List of formatted internship strings with status information

    • createInternship

      public String createInternship(String title, String description, String level, String major, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int slots)
      Creates a new internship with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      title - Internship title
      description - Internship description
      level - Difficulty level
      major - Preferred major
      openDate - Opening date
      closeDate - Closing date
      slots - Number of slots
      Returns:
      Formatted success message with internship details

    • viewApplications

      public List<String> viewApplications(int internshipID)
      Views all applications for a specific internship. Only the owner can view applications.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Returns:
      List of formatted application strings

    • getApplicationsForInternship

      public List<Application> getApplicationsForInternship(int internshipID)
      Gets applications for an internship as Application objects. Used for nested paginated view. Only the owner can access.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Returns:
      List of Application objects sorted by date (descending)

    • getApplicationDetails

      public String getApplicationDetails(int internshipID, int applicationID)
      Gets detailed information about a specific application. Only the internship owner can view application details.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      applicationID - The ID of the application
      Returns:
      Formatted application details

    • getInternshipDetails

      public String getInternshipDetails(int internshipID)
      Gets detailed information about a specific internship. Only the owner can view internship details.
      Specified by:
      getInternshipDetails in interface UserController
      Specified by:
      getInternshipDetails in class BaseUserController
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Returns:
      Formatted internship details

    • validateEditPermission

      public void validateEditPermission(int internshipID)
      Validates if the user has permission to edit an internship. Checks ownership and editability (PENDING or REJECTED status only).
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails

    • editInternship

      public void editInternship(int internshipID, String title, String description, String level, String major, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, Integer slots)
      Edits an existing internship. Only pending internships can be edited, and only by the owner.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to edit
      title - New title (null to skip)
      description - New description (null to skip)
      level - New level (null to skip)
      major - New preferred major (null to skip)
      openDate - New opening date (null to skip)
      closeDate - New closing date (null to skip)
      slots - New number of slots (null to skip)

    • deleteInternship

      public void deleteInternship(int internshipID)
      Deletes an internship. Only pending internships can be deleted, and only by the owner.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to delete

    • getApprovedInternships

      public List<String> getApprovedInternships()
      Gets all approved internships created by this company representative.
      Returns:
      List of formatted internship strings

    • toggleVisibility

      public boolean toggleVisibility(int internshipID)
      Toggles the visibility of an internship. Only approved internships can have visibility toggled, and only by the owner.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Returns:
      true if now visible, false if now invisible

    • confirmPlacement

      public void confirmPlacement(int internshipID, int applicationID)
      Confirms a student placement. Approves PENDING applications or confirms SUCCESSFUL applications. Only the internship owner can confirm placements.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      applicationID - The ID of the application

    • rejectApplication

      public void rejectApplication(int internshipID, int applicationID)
      Rejects an application. Company representatives can reject PENDING applications. Sets status to UNSUCCESSFUL.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      applicationID - The ID of the application

    • getInternshipsForFilter

      public List<Internship> getInternshipsForFilter()
      Gets internships for filter menu. Avoids exposing model to view layer.
      Returns:
      List of Internship objects

    • getInternships

      public List<Internship> getInternships()
      Gets filtered internships created by this company representative. Sorted by Status (PENDING → APPROVED → REJECTED → FILLED), then by ID.
      Returns:
      List of Internship objects sorted by status and ID

    • editProfile

      public void editProfile(String name, String email, String companyName, String department, String position)
      Edits company rep profile fields (null values skipped, in-memory only).
      Parameters:
      name - New name (null to skip)
      email - New email (null to skip)
      companyName - New company name (null to skip)
      department - New department (null to skip)
      position - New position (null to skip)
